Name: Instinct Rush 本能冲撞
About the game: When walking by guardrails, it's human instinct to rub guardrails with a stick; And I noticed in films katana or clothesline cuting off human body extremely fast. So I made this game: Use car to give people extra speed to damage, releasing human instinct urge. GAMEPLAY: Your car can collide into other cars to destroy them, but will be destroyed by cargoes. Touch guardrails, cut off human, gain energy and you will be invincible, also you can pick up power ups to survive longer. Drive as farther as you can while collecting coins to buy more cars that are more powerful.
